dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Welcome to the Wizards' Tower island in Lyondale Archipelago.
If you are seeking the knowledge about Thelras or magic, I recommend you go see Teldach inside the tower.

dialog.name: tellthelras
dialog.message: We Thelras are heavy users of magic. Spellcasting, wands, potions, horns, things like that. Our magic abilities are far greater than that of any other race.
For more information, go see Teldach to learn about more about Thelras.

dialog.name: whoteldach
dialog.message: Teldach is the oldest of our race. He's just inside the tower; you should go see him.
